title: Command Syntax Visual Guide
description: An interactive diagram that helps students understand the structure of Linux commands, including how commands, options, and arguments work together.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Linux
Terminal
Shell
Command Line
Commands
learningObjectives: Understand the three main parts of a Linux command
Identify commands, options, and arguments in any command
Apply this knowledge to read and construct new commands
Analyze unfamiliar commands by breaking them into components

controls.name: Example Command
controls.description: Choose from different command examples to explore
Hover over command parts for detailed explanations
Click on a component to lock the selection

limitations: Does not cover piping or redirection
